name: Amphisbaena (monstrosity)

trait.name: Two Heads
text: The Amphisbaena (monstrosity) has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, and knocked unconscious.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The Amphisbaena (monstrosity) makes two bite attacks.

action.name: Bite
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 3 (1d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

description: Source: Ghosts of Saltmarsh p. 230, Mythic Odysseys of Theros
